name: Fizik
description:
Fizik is a first-person parkour game that can be either relaxing or challenging depending on the simulation you decide to play. Master the timing of your jumps, wall-runs and grapples to beat your personal best runs.

3 types of levels.
  • Green levels are low-pressure: you can explore the space and take your time to master the parkour skills.
  • Red levels are intense: they require precision movement and quick reflexes to maneuver through.
  • Bonus challenge levels are unlocked by collecting secret orbs!

Key Features:
  • Wall-run like a badass
  • Chain Grapples together to glide through the levels
  • Slide down rediculous slopes to build momentum
  • Graciously bounce between bounce pads
  • 70+ Exciting Levels with secret collectables!
  • 10 secret levels!
